Text.Page: An urgent message from Tamur reaches you. Go to Kaiator and meet Tamur there.

Tamur asks you for help as unexpected events are occurring in Granarkus. Tamur asks you to go meet Hazel in Granarkus to find out the cause of the various phenomena.
While you are investigating a glowing pipe near the Sorgalur Complex, Jelena turns up. When you are talking to Jelena, the earth suddenly starts to quake.
Jelena is certain that the Hall of the Argon Queen is active. This matter needs to be reported to Seir so the Federation can respond to it.

It's been a while, .
You probably know that the argons are up to their old tricks again, even though Shandra Manaya is dead, right?
This is very alarming."What has happened?"

I received a message that a strange omen had appeared in Granarkus.
I cannot say exactly what it is. However, it is clear that various phenomena have occurred.

We would like to help, but as you know, peace has still not returned to Kaiator.
Please go to Granarkus and help the scholars there.

Finally, help has arrived.
And it's the guardian of Arborea, , at that! Finally, I can breathe easily.

I was very worried because there was no apparent cause for the various incidents. "What's going on?"

Several things have happened.
First of all, there are the argons' movements. However, far more important is the fact that the energy pipes that were inactive have started to radiate a strange light. The pipes shouldn't actually be glowing because Shandra Manaya is dead...

The light that is glowing from the Sorgalur Complex to the Hall of the Argon Queen worries me the most. Please find out the cause of these occurrences.
I fear we are on the brink of another argon war.

You also seem to have figured out that something's going on here.
I've come to investigate as Leander said that strange things were going on here.
He said it could develop into serious danger."Leander said that?"

I can understand why you would pull such a face. But please do not be too hasty with your judgment.

It is undisputed that Leander made major mistakes in the past. However, a lot has changed since Elleon died.
He seems to have taken over Elleon's role, and he does a lot of things for the common good.

Leander has also helped me. I felt so listless after Elleon's death.

Oh my goodness! That was a big quake!
The glowing pipe made me suspect it must be something serious, but now I'm sure that the Hall of the Argon Queen is active again.

You must leave for Velika immediately and report the occurrence to Commander Seir, !
We cannot handle the matter without the Federation's help.
